title: Curried lentils
ingredients: ['1 tbsp vegetable oil', '15g butter', '1 onion, finely chopped', '2 garlic cloves, crushed', '1 red pepper, seeded and diced', '1 tsp curry powder', '200g brown or green lentils', '100ml coconut milk', '1 tbsp chopped fresh coriander (optional)', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper']
